item.description: http://www.facebook.c... Time Monday, July 4 · 9:30am - 12:30pm -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Location Clark/Wilkins Elementary School 80 Boston Post Road Amherst, NH -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Created By New Hampshire for Ron Paul 2012 -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- More Info Bring friends, family, and even complete strangers to show your support for Dr. Paul in this years 4th of July parade in Amherst, NH. Show your fellow Granite Staters who you feel the best choice for president this year by marching the biggest parade in the state. The parade starts at 10am sharp, afterword we will have a booth setup to pass out information. We will have placards and yard signs to march with but we also encourage everyone to make their own fun original signs. All ages welcome, but we will be marching in a parade so plan on walking. Meet at Clark/Wilkins Elementary School, (80 Boston Post Road, Amherst) July 4th, 9:30am
item.name: Support Congressman Paul in 4th of July parade in Amherst, NH
